snippet: The drug, used to treat kidney disease complications, can increase the risk of heart disease, bone density problems and death.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration gives drug maker Keryx Biopharmaceuticals approval in United States for its ferric citrate drug to treat kidney disease complications, but clearance requires unexpected safety warnings.
lead_paragraph: The drug, used to treat kidney disease complications, can increase the risk of heart disease, bone density problems and death.

headline.main: Warnings Issued for Keryx Dialysis Drug
headline.print_headline: Warnings Issued for Keryx Dialysis Drug
